titleStmt.title: A new bull-bayting: or, A match play'd at the Town-Bull of Ely: by twelve mungrills. Viz. [brace] 4 English 4 Irish 4 Scotch [brace] doggs, Iohn Lilburn, Richard Overton, Thomas Prince, and William Walwyn, to stave and nose. ; With his last will and testament, and several legacies bequeathed to the Iuncto, the Councel of State, and army.
titleStmt.author: Lilburne, John, 1614?-1657.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at the sign of the [ ] by the hill on the whim-wham side of the beare-garden, for the good of the state.,

notesStmt.note: Imprint contains symbol for a bull?
Date of publication suggested by Wing. In ms. on t.p.: 1659.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
